_sText:
*** OLD VERSION ****

------------------------------------

Here my SONIC map inspired by the two first levels
of Sonic The Hedgehog (Genesis, Green Hill and Marble Zone).

Rings, sounds, TVs, looping, traps, secret ways...

Max 32 players, but it's maybe too much.

I didn't put a background music because I think it's boring when you play (you can't hear footsteps, gunfires, ...).

I hope you will like it. Enjoy :-)
